name: Guardian Angel
description:
Guardian Angel is still in development. Free 1-Level-Demo available!

A 2D-Arcade-Shooter inspired by the best Commodore Amiga-Shooters from the 80ies and 90ies.

Notify me on Launch!

If you like games like Apidya, Project X or Agony, you should give this a try.

Features (so far)
  • 7 levels with differnt settings and soundtracks
  • 50 different enemies
  • 3 special weapons (Flamethrower, Napalmbomb and Powerline)
  • 7 timed power-ups
  • Collect fuel and diamonds to recharge your special weapons
  • 3 difficulties
  • Hall of Fame
  • Intro/Outro
Features planned
  • 3 more levels and soundtracks
  • Controller support
  • More different enemies
  • Bossfights
  • Polish gameplay, graphics and sound

This game contains Lootcrates, and you can destroy them all!
